title: At a LIV Golf Event, Thin Crowds and a Tense Start
description: The controversy over the new golf series, which is backed by Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund, isn’t going away. But on the course, fans enjoyed the easygoing camaraderie among the players.
dc:creator: Bill Pennington and Doug Mills
media:description: Phil Mickelson stepped back after a heckler interrupted his opening tee shot on Friday.
